title: 4 Bed 4 Bath House Rental
posting_body: Or turn the 2 bedrooms in the lower level into media and game rooms, home offices, etc.  Fantastic options in this newly updated home.
Bring the outdoors in with this multi-level deck.
Basement walks out to privacy-fenced back yard and patio.
Freshly painted inside and out with great use of contemporary colors and fixtures.
Ample parking and storage with 3 car garage
